Our History
Open Since 1993
Sweetwater Branch Inn offers over 25 years of combined planning experience to help you create the perfect, seamless and effortless event. Open since 1993, Sweetwater is known for renowned food and exceptional service.  Treat your guests to the beauty, tranquility, and peacefulness conducive to a productive retreat or conference and delicious luncheon or dinner.
Because of its glass doors and windows, a McKenzie Hall event feels like an outdoor garden reception or luncheon during the day. At night, the colored glass cupola sends out a beckoning light while you stroll through the lit garden walkways. Day or night, the ivy laced bridge and arbor, seven unique fountains, magnificent gardens and reflecting koi pond provide a serene ambiance for all corporate events or Florida conferences.
Conference Center Facilities
What we offer
Ample free parking and easy roadway access to Williston-Waldo
Event space for both large and small groups (up to 250)
Full event planning & day-of assistance
Onsite chef & catering staff with bar service
Custom menu creation to fit your budget
Overnight accommodations
High-Speed Internet
Podium and Microphone
50″ x 70″ Slide Screen
Customized Floor Plans (click to enlarge)
Gourmet Cuisine
Event Catering
Event catering with freshly prepared original gourmet cuisine is available. The McKenzie Hall is equipped with a full kitchen facility, serving room, and spacious restrooms. It has a 250-guest hosting capacity for heavy hors d’oeuvres and a 180-guest hosting capacity for sit-down dinners. Smaller business meetings and conferences are hosted in the elegant McKenzie House.
Learn More
Mckenzie Hall Virtual Tour
Mckenzie House Virtual Tour
The Sweetwater inn Grounds
Our Beautiful Property
Sweetwater Branch Inn invites you to our beautiful property located in downtown Gainesville, just minutes from the University of Florida, Shands Hospital, the Cade Museum, and Depot Park along with fine dining, entertainment, and nightlife. Even if you never leave the property, the Sweetwater Branch Inn has plenty of great features for you to enjoy and relax with!
NEW Two Tesla chargers for guest use in the Sweetwater parking lot.
Learn More

Follow @sweetwater.branch.inn

Get in touch
We would love to hear from you!
At Sweetwater Branch Inn our staff is friendly, professional, and highly trained. Our goal is to ensure that every guest is afforded exemplary courtesy and service so that their Sweetwater visit is a unique, relaxing, and memorable experience.
At Sweetwater Branch Inn we aim to create, through exemplary service, beauty, and gracious attitude, an overall memorable and extraordinary experience for each of our guests that correspond with the overall effort of love and compassion that has gone into the making of the Sweetwater Branch Inn property.
Do you want to book a room or reserve space for a banquet? We would love to hear from you! You can contact us in one of the following ways below. If you would like to receive event pricing before coming for a tour appointment, please contact us with your event information so we may send you a custom wedding price package. Call
352-373-6760
or email Events to request a free tour or catering consult.

Personal & Social Events

Personal and Social Event Venue
Events for every occasion
start planning
Need a place for a big family reunion or a gathering of friends? As a family-owned business, Sweetwater Branch Inn has a true appreciation for friends and families. If you’re planning a family reunion or other special gathering, call Sweetwater, where the accommodations, cuisine, and comfort are sure to please everyone.
Learn More
Get in touch
Request a Proposal

Come together
Family Reunions, Birthdays, and Anniversaries
Have your anniversary, graduation party or family reunion only a few steps away from downtown Gainesville.
We can accommodate and provide a menu for up to 250 people for hors d’oeuvres or a light buffet and 150 people for sit-down dinners in the McKenzie Hall. Smaller events are hosted at the McKenzie House.
Our in-house catering menus compliment any occasion. From light fare to buffets to full-service, sit-down dining. With freshly prepared, original cuisine you’ll find menus to suit a variety of tastes and budgets.
Memorials
Celebration of Life
Providing food and drinks for guests at the memorial service isn’t likely to be at the top of your list of things to do. Our professional and discreet catering staff at Sweetwater Catering Co is adept at handling all of your hospitality needs in a dignified and efficient manner. This will help relieve the family of the burdens of planning for food and drinks at the funeral and memorial service. Our memorial catering takes care of everything from menu planning – with your input of course – to table settings to final clean up. This allows you to attend to your own needs and the needs of family and friends struggling with the loss.
Celebration event
College & Sports
Coming to town for graduation, to help your new student set up home in Gainesville, or for that special Gator sporting event? The Sweetwater Branch Inn is a great location, situated just minutes away from the University of Florida and Ben Hill Griffin Stadium. Why not pamper yourself and stay in one of the most beautifully restored Victorian mansions historic downtown Gainesville has to offer. Sweetwater is also close to Gainesville’s downtown nightlife. Be sure to book ahead for major sporting events.
Victorian Style
Holiday Parties
Plan your next family holiday party at Sweetwater to enjoy the splendor of a sparkling Victorian Holiday, plus all the amenities Sweetwater has to offer. Please be sure to book early for your Christmas and other holiday parties.
